title: OnePlus Watch review: boring looks, basic features
description: The OnePlus Watch is the first smartwatch from OnePlus. It costs just $159 and lasts up to two weeks between charges, but it also does a lot less than competing smartwatches from Samsung, Fossil, Apple, and others.
